action:
import io
import sys
def code_interpreter(parameters):
    code = parameters['code']
    captured_output = io.StringIO()
    sys.stdout = captured_output
    try:
        exec(code)
    except Exception as e:
        print("Exception while running code:")
        print(e)
    finally:
        sys.stdout = sys.__stdout__
    output_str = captured_output.getvalue()
    captured_output.close()
    return output_str
description: Executes the given code. The console output will be returned as a string.
name: code_interpreter
